quotes.quote: Technology is best when it brings people together.
quotes.author: Matt Mullenweg

quotes.quote: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Edward Teller

quotes.quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it, so it's part of everyday life.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Technology is a word that describes something that doesn't work yet.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The great myth of our times is that technology is communication.
quotes.author: Libby Larsen

quotes.quote: The Internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.
quotes.author: Christian Lous Lange

quotes.quote: The art challenges the technology, and the technology inspires the art.
quotes.author: John Lasseter
